Name: Pipistrello
Review Text: Visited Pipistrello a few days ago together with my girlfriend. We ordered the medium platter and an oven dish, which was enough for dinner. The wines were really good and the staff advised us very well on what to order. Food was delicious too. We’ll be back here.

Name: Pipistrello
Review Text: I found this gem of a bar and haven’t stopped coming ever since! Super cosy, fine wines and delicious food. Above all what makes Pipistrello great are the staff; always welcoming and friendly!

Name: Pipistrello
Review Text: Wine and food are super tasty, we took the big meat platter and the risotto bites to share! Definitely worth it if you are in the neighborhood.

Name: Pipistrello
Review Text: Everything was sooooo tasty! Really good food, wine and desserts. Don’t understand why on Thursday evening it’s not busy! Also nice girl working there, probably the owner.

Name: Pipistrello
Review Text: Perfect neighborhood winebar... cosy, unpretentious, comforting, super wine (with staff who are both knowledgeable and nice!) and fantastic anti pasti. My new go-to place :)

Name: Pipistrello
Review Text: Delicious Italian food, definitely a restaurant worth going to! Good service and lovely wines.

Name: Pipistrello
Review Text: Very beautiful place with a very elegance ambiance. This one is a recommendation for sure!

Name: Pipistrello
Review Text: Great wines, fantastic food to share. The owner of this place is lovely.

Name: Pipistrello
Review Text: Nice relaxed atmosphere, great sharing platters & good Italian wine

Name: Pipistrello
Review Text: You can eat there. But I dont think they actually have a kitchen... Just an oven
